thread.title: Nike Gifts Michael J. Fox With Self-Lacing Shoes
thread.title_full: Nike Gifts Michael J. Fox With Self-Lacing Shoes

title: Nike Gifts Michael J. Fox With Self-Lacing Shoes
text: — Michael J. Fox (@realmikefox) October 21, 2015 “We started creating something for fiction and we turned it into fact, inventing a new technology that will benefit all athletes,” the company said in a release. The shoe, the 2015 Nike Mag, is a limited edition release that will only be available via auction, the company said. All proceeds from the shoes will go to the Michael J. Fox Foundation for Parkinson's Research. "We started creating something for fiction and we turned it into fact, inventing a new technology that will benefit all athletes," said Nike President and CEO Mark Parker in a statement. Follow Nike News and Twitter @Nike during spring 2016 to find out details about the auctions. Published 2 hours ago
